content: विस्तृ {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> विस्तॄ {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To spread, diffuse. {@--2@} To cover, fill. {@--3@} To extend, expand. {@--4@} To strew or scatter about. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to spread or expand; as in पयोधरविस्तारयितृकं यौवनं <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To increase; <ls>R. 7. 39.</ls> {@--3@} To stretch, extend.
